none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 20, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Yet another stunner from the Lie Detector / East 7th / Suck Blood crew, MASOCHISM's guttural metallic hardcore makes me feel some kind of way. Mostly pissed. Like many of the bands from this sub-scene, the band falls more or less in line with sounds you already know....but somehow they are just more. Over the top, blown out stench played at light speed - I just don't know what else you could want. PLAGUE OF WARFARE

seo.title: Masochism - Plague Of Warfare - Terminal Escape
